name: Moshi Monsters: Moshlings Theme Park
overview: Rebuild the Theme Park - Prepare for goopendous thrills and spills as you explore and restore the legendary Moshlings: Theme Park. Find the Lost Moshlings - Get collecting as you round up 60 lost Moshlings. Play mini-games to unlock hints and tips to help you in your search. Experience Monsterific Rides - Hit splat-tastic high scores as you guide your Monster to glory aboard the wildest coasters, karts, slides and rides. Unlock Secret Areas - Go for gold playing wacky mini games and unlock monsterific new content with hidden codes. Monster Rewards - Trade Theme Park goodies via Streetpass and find hidden Moshlings using the exclusive ARG.
